name: BountyPay
blurb: A tool that provides seamless, automated bounty payouts for your open-source contributions. Simply fund with USDC on Base, and let BountyPay manage the rest efficiently.

name: Good First Issues
blurb: A platform that helps curious newcomers discover beginner-friendly issues from the most exciting projects in Crypto, Web3, Blockchain, and DeFi.

name: Flash
blurb: A decentralized application (dApp) that facilitates flash loan arbitrage between decentralized exchanges (DEXs).

name: Chain Trace
blurb: A blockchain analysis tool that offers valuable insights into NFT transaction histories. It provides comprehensive visualizations and statistics, aiding researchers, collectors, and developers in understanding how NFTs move through the Ethereum ecosystem.

name: Meta Scraper
blurb: A Visual Studio Code extension that enhances your privacy by allowing you to view and remove metadata from image files, ensuring your sensitive information remains secure when sharing images.

name: FeeVault
blurb: Minimal owner‑controlled vault for fee aggregation and sweeps.

name: RiskLedger
blurb: Merkle‑anchored weekly risk roots for protocol decisions.
